author: Napoleon Hill
message: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
title: Thought of the day

author: Oprah Winfrey
message: If you want your life to be more rewarding, you have to change the way you think.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Transformation doesn't take place with a vacuum; instead, it occurs when we are indirectly and directly connected to all those around us.
title: Thought of the day

author: Leonardo Ruiz
message: The only difference between your abilities and others is the ability to put yourself in their shoes and actually try.
title: Thought of the day
